channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Bleary Eyed – “Easy”
item.description: Unlock your chill vibes with Bleary Eyed's new track "Easy" 🎶 Let the music carry you away! 💫 #NewMusicDiscovery

item.title: Frank Ocean Releasing Channel Orange on Vinyl for the First Time
item.description: 🌊 Dive into nostalgia with Frank Ocean's classic album on vinyl! 🎶✨ #ChannelOrange #VinylRevival

item.title: My Morning Jacket playing ‘Z’ in full on tour
item.description: 🎸 Rock out with @mymorningjacket playing 'Z' live on tour! Who's joining the jam sesh? 🤘 #MMJ #ZTour

item.title: The Besnard Lakes announce new album, share “In Hollywood” video
item.description: 🚀 Dive into dreamy vibes with @BesnardLakes' upcoming album! 🌟 Watch their mesmerizing "In Hollywood" video now! 🎶 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Sarah McLachlan Announces First Album in 9 Years, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
item.description: 🚀 Sarah McLachlan is back with new music after 9 years! 🎶 Check out her latest video now! #SarahMcLachlan #NewMusicAlert
